sentence: Investigators with the Department of Justice concluded that there was no physical evidence to support that Michael Brown had surrendered hands raised to police officer Darren Wilson, but that Brown had likely attempted to take the officer's gun, run a short distance away after being shot in the hand, and then turned and was shot dead while facing the officer.
author: Krista Kafer
title: Kafer: In a promising year for GOP candidates, don't let the weak links spoil it
